name: Office of Good Persons
description:
this is  WIP i started yesterday on the behest of some work colleagues, you can see the video of where it's at below. It's going to be an online multiplayer smash stuff up fest where you throw things at each other. The current test build should work on both oculus and vive kits (requires tracked controllers) and features single player only with no damage model. Just jump in and throw stuff around to the looping music playing on the office PA.  I'm putting this up for preview because I can't test on a vive and I also have a 1080ti so I want to test on a range of rigs, so if you play it can you please let me know your specs and how well it ran.

CONTROLS:

grip: pick up objects

Trigger: make controllers have physical weight/Use item in hand

thumbstick/pad press: Activate teleport movement
